_header: Poor and hungry that han need
_description: Verses on who shall have the bliss of Heaven — two couplets translating ‘Pauper et esuriens mitis mundus miseratus’ (Matt. 5.3-10), which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Pore & hungri þat han nedeDebonere chaste and reuful
                    manPesible & wo for her m;isdedeÞese solen þe blisse of
                    heuene han
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 8.
